actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to require that the Administrator of General Services provide additional information in his annual reports concerning records management and disposition.
short_title: Federal Records Management and Disposition Information Act

summary.text: Federal Records Management and Disposition Information Act - Requires the Administrator of the General Services Administration to include the following information in the annual reports to Congress on the management and disposition of records by Federal agencies: (1) the total number of recommendations made by the Administrator to each agency concerning records management and disposition; and (2) the total benefits lost due to the failure of an agency to implement those recommendations during the current year and prior years.

titles.title: Federal Records Management and Disposition Information Act
A bill to require that the Administrator of General Services provide additional information in his annual reports concerning records management and disposition.
